/usr/bin/c++    -rdynamic CMakeFiles/HelloPangolin.dir/main.o  -o HelloPangolin   -L/usr/local/lib  -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib /usr/local/lib/libpango_python.so.0.9.2 /usr/local/lib/libpango_plot.so.0.9.2 /usr/local/lib/libpango_display.so.0.9.2 /usr/local/lib/libpango_windowing.so.0.9.2 /usr/local/lib/libpango_opengl.so.0.9.2 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libEGL.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libOpenGL.so -lepoxy /usr/local/lib/libpango_vars.so.0.9.2 /usr/local/lib/libpango_video.so.0.9.2 /usr/local/lib/libpango_image.so.0.9.2 /usr/local/lib/libpango_packetstream.so.0.9.2 /usr/local/lib/libpango_core.so.0.9.2 -lrt -lpthread
